name: Copycat (itch) (piskopat39)
description:
You  have a copycat and it's coming to get you! 

Can you escape yourself?


Use A-D to move, Space to jump.

This game was made solely by me for the EESTEC Game Jam in 48 hours.

All assets used in the game were made during the jam.

Thanks for playing!

Team Name : Antimatter

My Discord : piskopat39#2911
